availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Taylor (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farm laborer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Reese Taylor and Rhoda J. Glass Taylor. Married to Adella F. Scott Taylor in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 26, 1865. Student in Caldwell County in 1850. Farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 350B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 29.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #001929335.
Find A Grave, "G. W. Taylor (1842-1915)," Memorial #18546413, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/18546413 (accessed February 26, 2021).
